Name: Table Tennis Pro
About the game: The Ultimate Table Tennis (Ping-Pong) Simulator! Features: Innovative Control System - Provides full control of power and spin on shots, allowing you to hit the ball where you want to and how you want. 31 Intelligent Computer Players - Each with different playing styles and difficulty levels. Strategic Game Play - The unique control system combined with intelligent opponents allows for all table tennis situations to present themselves - shot drop shots over the net, floating back spin long shots - curling side spins - the choices are unlimited making the gameplay fantastic - all you'll need to do is practice. Multiplayer - The high skill factor involved in the game makes this an awesome game to play against a fellow human - almost as good as the real thing!* True 3D Environment - Includes lots of different playing environments, multiple tables, nets, stands and balls. Two-Player Games - Single- or split-screen modes for playing with another person on one machine. League and Tournament Competitions - Get involved in a long term competition to see where you stand. Practice Mode - Practice those tough shots against a fully programmable robot. Two Mini-Games included - Comes with two mini-games to further test your shot positioning skills and reaction - 'Disks' and 'Blocks'. Various difficulty levels and game speeds - To make the game suitable for all ages and all skill levels. Includes a 'Junior' mode for younger players, and a 'Professional' mode for expert players, with other modes in-between. Customizable Bats and Tables - Design your own custom bats and tables easily with special built-in design editors. Full Replay Functionality - Save entire games so you can enjoy watching your skills again and again. * Note: Multiplayer play may not be available on some systems depending on firewall setup and other scenarios.
